root: ^Evil Wizard: You! This treachery reeks of your hand!
^Judas: I swear, I had nothing to do with this!
^Evil Wizard: Judas! You traitor! You’re the one who ended him! Prepare to face my wrath!
^Judas: I didn’t kill him! Why are you so quick to blame me?
^Evil Wizard: Lies! The signs all point to you! I will not let this betrayal go unpunished!
